trans-unit.source: Provides data for callbacks that can be inserted in the sequence for object initialization and property setting.
trans-unit.target: 可插入对象初始化和属性设置为序列中的回调提供数据。

trans-unit.source: This influences the object graph that is produced by <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这会影响生成的对象图<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The applicable callbacks all use the generic <xref:System.EventHandler%601> that carries XamlObjectEventArgs event data.
trans-unit.target: 适用的回调全部使用泛型<xref:System.EventHandler%601>XamlObjectEventArgs 事件数据执行的。</xref:System.EventHandler%601>

trans-unit.source: You define the handlers and then set references to them by setting properties of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 定义处理程序并通过设置属性的<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings>将对其的引用

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectEventArgs"></xref> class.
The object instance that is relevant to the event data.
trans-unit.target: 与事件数据相关对象实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line number of the relevant object instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相关对象实例的行号。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the element.
Gets or sets the position in the line of the relevant object instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相关对象实例的行中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position in the line of the element.
Gets the object instance that is relevant to the event data.
trans-unit.target: 获取与事件数据相关的对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The object instance that is relevant to the event data.
trans-unit.target: 与事件数据相关对象实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the BAML URI of the relevant object instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相关对象实例的 BAML URI。

trans-unit.source: The BAML URI of the relevant object instance.
trans-unit.target: 相关对象实例的 BAML URI。
